attributes.action: Please Regulate Trade Associations, Too Many & Too Confusing for Consumers..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition, there are too many of these to keep up with... we only need what is necessary to protect the consumer.

There are so many that it will self defeat the reasons designed to protect... and will over inflate prices to the consumers... legitimate associations will also suffer because mr/mrs average dont know who matters when it comes to trade associations and alike.
